001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.DomainObject;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.initializers.NeuralNetworkInitializer;
006
007import java.util.Map;
008import java.util.Set;
009
010/**
011 * Represents a neural network as a specific kind of {@link EstimationFunction}.
012 * <p>
013 * A neural network consists of multiple layers of {@link Neuron}s connected
014 * through weighted edges. This interface exposes structural information
015 * (layers, neurons, connections), parameter management, and initialization
016 * capabilities. It does not prescribe a specific network architecture
017 * (e.g., fully connected, convolutional, recurrent).
018 * </p>
019 *
020 * <h2>Responsibilities:</h2>
021 * <ul>
022 *   <li>Expose the <b>topology</b> of the network in terms of layers and neurons.</li>
023 *   <li>Provide access to <b>parameters</b> (weights, biases) for training
024 *       and persistence.</li>
025 *   <li>Support <b>initialization</b> of parameters through an {@link NeuralNetworkInitializer}.</li>
026 *   <li>Inherit evaluation capabilities from {@link EstimationFunction},
027 *       such as mapping inputs to outputs.</li>
028 * </ul>
029 */
030@DomainObject
031public interface NeuralNetwork extends EstimationFunction {
032
033    /**
034     * Returns the number of neurons in the given layer.
035     *
036     * @param layer the layer index (0-based, where 0 is the input layer)
037     * @return the number of neurons in that layer
038     * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the layer index is invalid
039     */
040    int getWidth(int layer);
041
042    /**
043     * Returns the total number of layers in the network, including input and output layers.
044     *
045     * @return the depth of the network
046     */
047    int getDepth();
048
049    /**
050     * Returns a specific neuron in the network by its layer and index.
051     *
052     * @param layer the layer index (0-based)
053     * @param index the index of the neuron within the layer (0-based)
054     * @return the neuron at the specified position
055     * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the indices are invalid
056     */
057    Neuron getNeuron(int layer, int index);
058
059    /**
060     * Returns a specific neuron in the network by its layer and index.
061     *
062     * @param layer     the layer index (0-based)
063     * @param index     the index of the neuron within the layer (0-based)
064     * @param classType the class of the neuron to be returned
065     * @return the neuron at the specified position
066     * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the indices are invalid
067     */
068    <N extends Neuron> N getNeuron(int layer, int index, Class<N> classType);
069
070    /**
071     * Returns the outgoing connections of a given neuron in the network.
072     * <p>
073     * Each connection is represented as a mapping from a target neuron
074     * to the weight of the connection.
075     * </p>
076     *
077     * @param layer the layer index of the source neuron
078     * @param index the index of the source neuron within the layer
079     * @return a map of target neurons to their associated connection weights
080     */
081    Map<Neuron, Float> getOutputConnections(int layer, int index);
082
083    /**
084     * Returns the target neurons of the given neuron (thus the downstream nodeds).
085     *
086     * @param neuron the neuron for which the targets are returned
087     * @return the target neurons
088     */
089    Set<Neuron> getTargetNeurons(Neuron neuron);
090
091    /**
092     * Returns the total number of trainable parameters in the network
093     * (typically weights + biases).
094     *
095     * @return the number of parameters
096     */
097    int getParameterCount();
098
099    /**
100     * Returns all parameters (weights, biases) of the network as a flat array.
101     * <p>
102     * The order of parameters is implementation-defined but must be consistent
103     * across calls to enable saving and restoring network state.
104     * </p>
105     *
106     * @return a flat array of parameters
107     */
108    float[] getParameters();
109
110    /**
111     * Accepts a {@link net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuronVisitor} to traverse
112     * the structure of this neural network.
113     * This allows external visitors to analyze, transform, or export the
114     * network structure without coupling to its internal implementation.
115     *
116     * @param visitor the visitor to apply to this network
117     */
118    void accept(NeuronVisitor visitor);
119
120}
